title: Rally to Prevent Skin Cancer: #ChooseSkinHealth | Major League Soccer & NEUTROGENA®
description:
Direct sun exposure is the #1 environmental cause of skin cancer, but it is also the most preventable risk factor.  Major League Soccer and NEUTROGENA® have teamed up to spread the word on how to prevent skin cancer.

For both kids and parents, the countless soccer games this summer could add up to over 27,000 minutes of direct sun exposure. You’ll want to be prepared with the best sunscreen to protect your skin from the sun’s harmful ultraviolet rays. 

Join MLS and NEUTROGENA® in skin cancer prevention and #ChooseSkinHealth. To find the best sunscreen for your lifestyle visit:  http://www.neutrogena.com/category/sun.do?nType=1
